title: IndiaMART: Search Products, Buy, Sell & Trade
description:
🏆‘Best Business App’ at Drivers of Digital Summit & Awards, 2018
IndiaMART: Search for Products, Buyers, Sellers, Resellers, Wholesalers, Manufacturers & Retailers in India
With the IndiaMART App, millions of buyers & sellers can connect with each other to fulfill their business requirements. Browse through India's 🇮🇳 largest online B2B marketplace & explore the widest range of 63 Mn products & services. Expand your business' visibility to reach more than 93 Mn registered Buyers or 5.9 Mn genuine Suppliers for your sourcing requirements. IndiaMART brings together leading manufacturers, verified sellers, resellers, wholesalers & retailers looking for an easy way to widen their reach manifold.
The IndiaMART App comes loaded with features that make it easy to connect to & find new online shopping opportunities anytime, anywhere.
🏆IndiaMART Crowned Award:
* Most Promising Company of the Year at the CNBC Awaaz CEO Awards 2019
* Manthan Award
* Red Herring Award
Get in touch with sellers, resellers, retailers & wholesalers from our top selling online shopping categories:
1. Electronics & Electrical Goods & Services
2. Building & Construction Material
3. Industrial Plants & Machinery
4. Apparel Clothing & Garments
And Thousands More...
Why switch to IndiaMART App?
For Buyers:
1.  Search for Products & Services 24x7, Send Enquiries & Post your Requirements. Get instant alerts & stay updated no matter where you are.
2. Post Requirements & Send Enquiries in Offline Mode as well.
3.  Compare Quotes from multiple suppliers & get best prices.
4. Pay instantly and do business securely using Pay with IndiaMART.
5. Buy from sellers near you - Search in your area with the help of Geo-Location.
6. Get detailed information about products & chat with sellers on the go. Discuss your requirement in detail, negotiate the price & buy from India's trusted suppliers.
7. Mark your preferred products as "My Favorites" to check them out later.
For Sellers :
1. Purchase Buy Leads on the go - Connect to potential customers instantly & discover new opportunities to sell online.
2. Review & Respond to enquiries anytime, anywhere, categorize them into multiple folders. Sell to interested customers easily.
3. Receive Payments hassle-free through Pay with IndiaMART.
4. Add reminders & notes to increase lead conversion. Add prices to your catalog easily.
5. Search Buy Leads by Product Name & increase your chances of conversion.
6. Never miss an opportunity to grow sales. Receive instant buy leads & enquiry notifications.
7. Upload & Download PDF, Product Images, Documents in Enquiry chat for better communication.
The IndiaMART App also supports exclusive features for individual accounts, as well as detailed catalog listing view, as per categories & sub-categories, thus facilitating on-the-go deals for them. Whether you are an importer or exporter, seller or reseller, manufacturer, wholesaler or a SME, with the help of IndiaMART App, you can buy & sell across the globe with utmost ease. Get instant buy leads & sell with high rates of conversion. Join over 5.9 Mn suppliers who are already a part of IndiaMART.
Pay with IndiaMART
Pay with IndiaMART is a payment gateway that enables IndiaMART's sellers & buyers to accept & make instant online payments through Credit/Debit card, Net Banking, Wallet, ATM-cum-debit card. The service is available even on holidays. Pay with IndiaMART provides 100% Buyer Protection to all Indian Buyers.
You say, we hear:
Permission requested:
READ_SMS:  To read and auto fill the OTP for Bank Transactions.
CALL_PHONE: To initiate a direct call from buyers to sellers and sellers to buyers to fulfill the requirements.
For any queries, you can call our dedicated customer care helpline number 📞 09696969696 or write to us at  AppCare@indiamart.com

developer_address: 6th floor, Tower 2, Assotech Business Cresterra, Plot No.22, Sec 135, Noida, Uttar Pradesh - 201 305, India
